mapper.insert: insert into ReplyBoards(board_no, member_id, replyBoard_content) values(#{board_no}, #{member_id}, #{replyBoard_content})
mapper.select: select * from ReplyBoards where board_no = #{board_no} order by replyBoard_no desc
mapper.update: update ReplyBoards set replyBoard_content = #{replyBoard_content}, replyBoard_updateDate = now() where replyBoard_no = #{replyBoard_no}
